import { Avatar, Input, ListItem, Menu, } from '@material-ui/core'; import React, { useContext,useState } from 'react' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, CardHeader, Col, Container, Row, } from 'reactstrap'; import { userContext } from './../context/context' import { FcSearch } from 'react-icons/fc' import { IoMdPersonAdd,} from 'react-icons/io' import {ImCross} from 'react-icons/im' import Message from '../Component/Message'; import Addcon from '../Component/Addcon'; export default function Home() { const [search,setSearch] = useState(false); const [addCon,setAddCon] = useState(false); const [msg,setMsg] = useState(''); const context = useContext(userContext); context.socket.on('connect',(socket)=>{ console.log(`${socket} connected to room`); context.socket.on('hello',(msg)=>{ console.log(msg) }) }) context.socket.on('disconnect',(socket)=>{ console.log('Socket connection disconnected'); }) return (
{context.token ? ( <>
{context.user.user?.name}
{search ? (
setSearch(false)}/>
) : ( <>
Connections
setSearch(true)}/>
setAddCon(true)} />
)}
setMsg('someUsername')}>
Elone Musk
Flex item
{addCon ? ( ) : ( <> {msg ? ( ):( )} )}
) : ( )}
) }
